data.text: Acunüng bawingawhnak üng ngawki naw caktawm a khyet lama kpawm se ka hmuh. Ahnu ama ca ng’yu lü msingnak he khyüh am msing awm se ka hmuh.
Acunüng khankhawngsä akkyan kcang naw angsang yea, “U naw msingnak he jah kphyan lü caktawm mhmawng khaia nghlawiki ni?” tia, ngpyang se ka hmuh.
Cunsepi Khankhawa pi kyase, khawmdek khana pi kyase, mce k’uma5:3:mce k’uma:Thihnak khaw  pi kyase, caktawm mhmawng thei lü akhui üngka teng thei khai mat pi am awm.
Acunüng caktawm mhmawng lü ak’uma teng thei nghlawiki u pi am a awma phäh aktäa ka kyapki.

5:5: Gen 49:9; Hesa 11:1,10Acunüng ngvai he üngka mat naw ka veia, Ä kyapa; Tenga, Ngnängnak yahki Judah pakhui üngka Mukei, Davita mjü akyäp säih naw msingnak khyüh kphyan lü caktawm mhmawng khaia nghlawiki ni” a ti.

Acunüng bawingawhnaka nglung üng Toca ngdüiki cun xüngksei kphyü la angvai he naw nglungna u se ka hmuh. Toca cun hnim pänga mäih lawki. Acun naw khyüh k'kina lü khyüh mik naki. Acun cun khawmdek avana khana tüih pänga Pamhnama ngmüimkhya he khyüha kyaki.
Toca naw cit lü bawingawhnak üng ngawkia kut kpat lam üngka caktawm cun a lawh.

5:8: Sal 141:2 Acukba caktawm a lawh päng la xüngseikia xüngksei kphyü la angvai mkulei-kphyü he cun Toca ma ngbawki he. Cawng la ng'uinghnamki am bekia xüi kbe he jah kpawmei phäh phähki he. Acuna ng’uinghnam he cun Pamhnama khyang hea ktaiyünaka kyaki.
5:9:Sal 33:3; 98:1; Sal 42:10Acunüng ami ng’äi kthai ami mcuk cun:
Nang naw Pamhnam khüih khai hea ktaiyü mjü hea na jah pyangki,
Acunüng ka han teng üng, bawingawhnak, xüngksei he la angvai hea peia ngdüikia khankhawngsä athawng atawnga am jah kheh khawh vaia dämki hea kthai ka ngjaki.
Acunüng khankhaw la khawmdek khan, khawmdeka k'keh, mliktui k’uma awmki he la khawliva üng mhmünmceng he naküt avan naw,
Acunüng xüngksei kphyü he naw, “Amen,” tia ami msang. Acunüng angvai he naw ngbawk u lü sawhkhahki he.
